inclusion.criterion: 1-2 branches with the stenotic rate < 70% involved
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: mildly ischemic manifestation relative to activity but relieve after rest
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no or low degree of organ insufficiency: NYHF I~II; eGFR (MRDR) ≥ 60ml/min
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Acute or chronic active infections including tuberculosis, hepatitis virus, etc.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Other autoimmune diseases including systemic lupus erythematosus, Behcet disease, IgG4
exclusion.label: unknown
